title: green smoothies with ginger
directions: Put the kale, apple, chia seeds and ginger in a blender; pour in the cran-pom juice and lemon juice.
Blend until smooth. Drink right away (it will thicken as it stands from the chia seeds).
ingredients: 1 cup packed torn organic kale leaves (see note)
1 green apple, peeled, cored and chopped
1/2 inch piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated
1 cup organic cranberry-pomegranate juice, such as Knudsen
Put the kale, apple, chia seeds and ginger in a blender; pour in the cran-pom juice and lemon juice.
Blend until smooth. Drink right away (it will thicken as it stands from the chia seeds).
